EpiCompare compares different epigenetic datasets for benchmarking and quality control purposes. 

### Dataset summary

Summary of input peak files 

```{r name, echo=FALSE}
n <- 1
for (name in params$file_name){
  print(paste0("File", n, ": ", name))
  n <- n + 1
}
```
